task1

Class Hyperbola

  • java.lang.Object
    • task1.Hyperbola
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Curve

    public class Hyperbola
extends java.lang.Object
implements Curve
    The class serves to store data about a curve of the second order - Hyperbola with properties x and y.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Arina Kholodnytska
